statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE location='New York'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY location
SELECT date, location, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp, location FROM weather_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY average_temp DESC
SELECT date, location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 80 AND location IN ('California', 'Florida') ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 10
SELECT date, location, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM wind_data;
SELECT id, wind_speed FROM wind_data WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT date, wind_speed FROM wind_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, date FROM wind_data WHERE wind_speed < 10;
SELECT id, temperature FROM wind_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, date, wind_speed, temperature FROM wind_data WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, production FROM energy_production WHERE production < 1000 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, temperature FROM wind_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT date, wind_speed FROM wind_data WHERE wind_speed IS NOT NULL AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY date LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, production FROM wind_data, energy_production WHERE wind_data.date = energy_production.date ORDER BY production DESC;
SELECT temperature, air_pressure FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT city, country FROM location WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT date, time, wind_speed FROM energy_production WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT temperature, air_pressure, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT city, longitude, latitude FROM location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT date, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT city, country, longitude, latitude FROM location WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT date, time, power_generated FROM energy_production WHERE location_id = 1 AND power_generated >= 1000 ORDER BY date ASC, power_generated DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE air_pressure < 1000 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC
SELECT city, country, longitude, latitude FROM location WHERE longitude < 0 ORDER BY longitude DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, production FROM WindEnergyProduction WHERE production < 1000 ORDER BY production ASC;
SELECT date, forecasted_temperature, forecasted_wind_speed FROM WeatherForecasts WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_type, results FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_type LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(production) AS max_production, MIN(production) AS min_production FROM WindEnergyProduction WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT date, forecasted_temperature, forecasted_wind_speed FROM WeatherForecasts WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND forecasted_temperature < 15;
SELECT date, analysis_type FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindEnergyProduction WHERE production > 1000;
SELECT site_id, location, capacity FROM WindFarmInformation ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE location='New York' AND temperature < 15 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT date, location, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE location='Seattle' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, location, temperature_range, wind_speed_range FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature_range='High' OR wind_speed_range='Strong' ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT site_id, location, capacity, start_date FROM WindFarmInformation ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
